title: CDISC Pilot Extended Datasets
text: cdisc_pilot_extended data source provides enhanced version CDISC Pilot Study data additional derived variables new urinalysis dataset (ADLBURI). data source designed support advanced clinical data analysis scenarios demonstrate additional CDISC ADaM conventions.

what: What’s New in the Extended Datasets
title: CDISC Pilot Extended Datasets
text: extended datasets include several enhancements standard CDISC Pilot data:

previous_headings: What’s New in the Extended Datasets
title: CDISC Pilot Extended Datasets
text: Available : ADSL, ADTTE Useful : Long-term exposure analysis, time--event modeling

previous_headings: What’s New in the Extended Datasets
title: CDISC Pilot Extended Datasets
text: new laboratory dataset focusing urinalysis parameters.

title: CDISC Pilot Extended Datasets
code: # Install the package remotes::install_github("lovemore-gakava/clinTrialData")  library(clinTrialData)

previous_headings: Quick Start
what: Connect to the Extended Data Source
title: CDISC Pilot Extended Datasets
code: library(clinTrialData) library(dplyr) library(ggplot2)  # Connect to the extended CDISC Pilot data db <- connect_clinical_data("cdisc_pilot_extended")  # List available ADaM datasets db$adam$list_content_cnt()

previous_headings: Quick Start
title: CDISC Pilot Extended Datasets
text: datasets standard CDISC Pilot data included, plus: ADaM Datasets: ADSL - Subject-Level Analysis Dataset (TRTDURY) ADTTE - Time--Event Analysis Dataset (TRTDURY) ADLB - Combined laboratory data (chemistry, hematology, Hy’s Law, urinalysis) ADLBC, ADLBH, ADLBHY - Individual laboratory datasets ADAE - Adverse events ADVS - Vital signs ADQSADAS, ADQSCIBC, ADQSNPIX - Questionnaire data ADLBURI - Urinalysis (new!) SDTM Datasets: standard SDTM datasets (DM, AE, VS, LB, CM, DS, EX, MH, QS, SC, SE, SV, SUPPAE, SUPPDM, SUPPDS, SUPPLB, TA, TE, TI, TS, TV, RELREC)

title: CDISC Pilot Extended Datasets
text: extended datasets generated using data-raw/create_extended_datasets.R. like modify enhance extended datasets, can : Fork repository GitHub create pull request fork/branch, modify script data-raw/create_extended_datasets.R Run script regenerate datasets Submit pull request enhancements Note: Extended datasets modified installed package directly. Contributions must made package development workflow (fork/PR). contribute, visit GitHub repository.

title: CDISC Pilot Extended Datasets
text: extended datasets derived CDISC Pilot Study data. Original Source: CDISC SDTM/ADaM Pilot Project Modifications: extended version includes additional derived variables (TRTDURY) simulated urinalysis dataset (ADLBURI) created educational development purposes. Acknowledgments: acknowledge thank CDISC making original pilot data available. extended datasets maintain structure quality original data adding features support additional analysis scenarios.

title: CDISC Pilot Extended Datasets
text: Explore Getting Started vignette basic package usage Review standard CDISC Pilot data comparison Use extended datasets develop test advanced analysis workflows Contribute extensions analysis examples

title: CDISC Pilot Extended Datasets
text: questions, issues, contributions, please visit GitHub repository.

title: Getting Started with clinTrialData
text: clinTrialData package provides easy access clinical trial example datasets multiple sources. data stored efficient Parquet format can accessed using connector package unified interface. Key features: Automatic discovery: Data sources automatically detected scanning package directory structure Generic interface: Use connect_clinical_data() connect available data source Dynamic configuration: need maintain static configuration files Extensible: Add new data sources simply adding directories parquet files

title: Getting Started with clinTrialData
code: # Install from GitHub remotes::install_github("lovemore-gakava/clinTrialData")

title: Getting Started with clinTrialData
code: library(clinTrialData)  # View all available data sources list_data_sources() #>                 source          description    domains  format #> 1          cdisc_pilot CDISC Pilot 01 Study adam, sdtm parquet #> 2 cdisc_pilot_extended cdisc_pilot_extended adam, sdtm parquet

previous_headings: Quick Start
title: Getting Started with clinTrialData
code: # View all available data sources sources <- list_data_sources() print(sources)

previous_headings: Quick Start
title: Getting Started with clinTrialData
code: # Connect to CDISC Pilot data (or any available source) db <- connect_clinical_data("cdisc_pilot")  # List available datasets in ADaM domain db$adam$list_content_cnt()  # Read ADSL dataset adsl <- db$adam$read_cnt("adsl") head(adsl)

previous_headings: Quick Start
title: Getting Started with clinTrialData
code: # Get dataset dimensions dim(adsl)  # View structure str(adsl)  # Summary statistics summary(adsl)

previous_headings: Working with Different Domains
title: Getting Started with clinTrialData
code: # Read adverse events data adae <- db$adam$read_cnt("adae")  # Read lab data adlbc <- db$adam$read_cnt("adlbc")

previous_headings: Working with Different Domains
title: Getting Started with clinTrialData
code: # Read demographics dm <- db$sdtm$read_cnt("dm")  # Read vital signs vs <- db$sdtm$read_cnt("vs")

title: Getting Started with clinTrialData
text: package automatically discovers available data sources. can easily switch different sources work multiple sources simultaneously:
code: # Get information about all sources all_sources <- list_data_sources()  # Connect to different sources for (source_name in all_sources$source) {   cat("Connecting to:", source_name, "\n")   db <- connect_clinical_data(source_name)    # List domains available in this source   cat("Available domains:", names(db), "\n") }

title: Getting Started with clinTrialData
code: library(dplyr)  # Connect to data source db <- connect_clinical_data("cdisc_pilot")  # Read subject-level data adsl <- db$adam$read_cnt("adsl")  # Basic demographic summary by treatment demo_summary <- adsl %>%   group_by(TRT01A) %>%   summarise(     n = n(),     mean_age = mean(AGE, na.rm = TRUE),     female_pct = mean(SEX == "F", na.rm = TRUE) * 100,     .groups = "drop"   )  print(demo_summary)

title: Getting Started with clinTrialData
text: package designed extensible. like contribute new data source package, can : Fork repository GitHub create pull request fork/branch, create directory inst/exampledata/ source name Organize data subdirectories (e.g., adam/, sdtm/, output/) Place .parquet files appropriate subdirectories source automatically discovered list_data_sources() Submit pull request new data source Note: Data sources added installed package directly. Contributions must made package development workflow (fork/PR). Example directory structure contributors: contribute, visit GitHub repository.
code: inst/exampledata/ ├── cdisc_pilot/ │   ├── adam/ │   │   ├── adsl.parquet │   │   └── adae.parquet │   └── sdtm/ │       ├── dm.parquet │       └── ae.parquet └── your_new_source/     ├── adam/     │   └── your_data.parquet     └── sdtm/         └── your_data.parquet

previous_headings: Data Attribution
title: Getting Started with clinTrialData
text: CDISC Pilot Study data included package comes CDISC SDTM/ADaM Pilot Project, demonstrates implementation CDISC standards regulatory submissions. Source: CDISC SDTM/ADaM Pilot Project Description: pilot study data created demonstrate use CDISC standards (SDTM ADaM) regulatory submissions. data represents fictional clinical trial serves educational resource clinical research community. Usage: data provided educational development purposes help users understand CDISC standards develop tools clinical data analysis. Acknowledgments: acknowledge thank CDISC making valuable educational resource available community. data converted Parquet format efficient storage access maintaining original structure content. additional variations data, see also: - PHUSE Test Data Factory - CDISC-split folder - Multiple studies variation

title: Authors and Citation
text: Lovemore Gakava. Author, maintainer, copyright holder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Gakava L (2026). clinTrialData: Clinical Trial Example Datasets. R package version 0.1.0, https://lovemore-gakava.github.io/clinTrialData/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {clinTrialData: Clinical Trial Example Datasets},   author = {Lovemore Gakava},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://lovemore-gakava.github.io/clinTrialData/}, }

title: Clinical Trial Example Datasets
text: clinTrialData package provides access clinical trial example datasets R. Data stored Parquet format accessed connector package.

title: Clinical Trial Example Datasets
text: Multiple clinical trial data sources (CDISC Pilot 01 extended datasets) Complete ADaM SDTM datasets Parquet format efficient storage fast access Automatic data protection prevents accidental modifications Integration connector package Consistent API across data sources

title: Clinical Trial Example Datasets
text: can install development version clinTrialData GitHub:
code: # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("lovemore-gakava/clinTrialData")

title: Clinical Trial Example Datasets
code: library(clinTrialData)  # View available data sources list_data_sources()  # Connect to a data source db <- connect_clinical_data("cdisc_pilot")  # List available datasets db$adam$list_content_cnt() db$sdtm$list_content_cnt()  # Read a dataset adsl <- db$adam$read_cnt("adsl") dm <- db$sdtm$read_cnt("dm")

previous_headings: Available Data Sources
title: Clinical Trial Example Datasets
text: Standard CDISC Pilot 01 datasets (10 ADaM, 22 SDTM) quick testing examples.

previous_headings: Available Data Sources
title: Clinical Trial Example Datasets
text: Enhanced CDISC Pilot 01 datasets (11 ADaM, 24 SDTM) additional features: TRTDURY - Treatment duration years ADLBURI - Urinalysis laboratory dataset (new) ADLB - Combined labs including urinalysis Use list_data_sources() complete details.

title: Clinical Trial Example Datasets
text: Datasets automatically protected accidental modifications: Reading data allowed Writing removing data blocked manual lock management required Clear error messages write operations attempted

title: Clinical Trial Example Datasets
text: See package vignettes detailed information data source:
code: # View all available vignettes vignette(package = "clinTrialData")  # View CDISC Pilot extended datasets vignette("cdisc-pilot-extended", package = "clinTrialData")

title: Clinical Trial Example Datasets
text: Datasets stored Apache Parquet format efficient storage fast access.

what: Check if study folder should be written — can_write_study
title: Check if study folder should be written — can_write_study
text: Helper function check study folder can safely written . Returns TRUE folder can written, FALSE locked. Issues warning folder locked.

title: Check if study folder should be written — can_write_study
code: can_write_study(study_path, operation = "write to study folder")

title: Check if study folder should be written — can_write_study
text: study_path Path study folder operation Description operation attempted

title: Check if study folder should be written — can_write_study
text: Logical indicating operation can proceed

title: Clinical Trial Datasets — clinTrialData-data
text: clinTrialData package contains clinical trial datasets multiple sources, stored Parquet format. Data accessed using connector functions.

title: Clinical Trial Datasets — clinTrialData-data
text: CDISC Pilot 01 Study Data Various clinical trial data sources

title: Clinical Trial Datasets — clinTrialData-data
text: CDISC Pilot 01 study data includes ADaM SDTM domains. ADaM datasets include: ADSL: Subject-Level Analysis Dataset ADAE: Adverse Events Analysis Dataset ADLB: Laboratory Analysis Dataset (combined) ADLBC: Laboratory Analysis Dataset (Chemistry) ADLBH: Laboratory Analysis Dataset (Hematology) ADLBHY: Laboratory Analysis Dataset (Hy's Law) ADLBURI: Laboratory Analysis Dataset (Urinalysis) SDTM datasets include: DM: Demographics AE: Adverse Events VS: Vital Signs LB: Laboratory Test Results

title: Clinical Trial Datasets — clinTrialData-data
text: Data sources discovered scanning package directory structure. List available datasets list_data_sources(). Access data using connection function:
code: # Connect to any data source (e.g., CDISC Pilot data) db <- connect_clinical_data("cdisc_pilot")  # List available datasets db$adam$list_content_cnt()  # Read a dataset adsl <- db$adam$read_cnt("adsl")  # See all available data sources list_data_sources()

title: Clinical Trial Datasets — clinTrialData-data
text: Datasets stored Parquet format: Columnar storage Fast reads Compression Cross-platform compatibility

title: Clinical Trial Datasets — clinTrialData-data
text: CDISC. Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium. https://www.cdisc.org/

what: Connect to Clinical Data by Source — connect_clinical_data
title: Connect to Clinical Data by Source — connect_clinical_data
text: Generic connection function allows access data source package. Data sources automatically discovered scanning package's example data directory structure.

title: Connect to Clinical Data by Source — connect_clinical_data
code: connect_clinical_data(source = "cdisc_pilot")

title: Connect to Clinical Data by Source — connect_clinical_data
text: source Character string specifying data source. Use list_data_sources() see available options.

title: Connect to Clinical Data by Source — connect_clinical_data
text: connectors object

title: Connect to Clinical Data by Source — connect_clinical_data
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Connect to CDISC Pilot data db <- connect_clinical_data("cdisc_pilot")  # List available datasets db$adam$list_content_cnt()  # Read a dataset adsl <- db$adam$read_cnt("adsl")  # List available sources list_data_sources() } # }

text: Generic function connect data source scanning directory structure generating connector configuration dynamically. Wraps filesystem connectors lock protection.

text: source_name Name data source (e.g., "cdisc_pilot")
